item.title: What if robots do all the work? ‚Äì Finding Meaning in Life
item.description: If robots do all the work, there won‚Äôt be any scarcity of human manpower, food, shelter and basic needs and most wants. Most people will have nothing to do, or will they? item.title: Farmer Protests Explained ‚Äì The promise to increase revenue by 200%
item.description: The new farm laws promise to 2x yes you read that correctly the income{.rank-math-link} of farmers in the next 2 years by relying on the deregulation of the market.
